This technique allows the user to take a small chunk of rock and turn it into the shape of a staff. The user can then use it as a melee weapon or throwing weapon. A variation of this technique allows the user to create several staves and launch them at the target, but with less accuracy.

[[es:Elemento Tierra: Bastón de Roca]]
[[fr:Doton - Bâton de Roche]]
[[pl:Doton: Gansetsukon]]
